title: Karlach
tags: where to find karlach in bg3
how to romance karlach in bg3
content:
ke Shadowheart and Lae'Zel.

Additionally, her background (as someone who just escaped the Hells) attunes her towards outgoing people who take actions that express their love of life. As with all the Companions, whenever you can talk to Karlach, always scour the dialogue options for any new options, again still following the general guidelines above, where she'll slowly open up to you about things that will help you deepen your bond with her further and further.
